projects.title: Notes App
projects.description: Effortlessly organize, remember, and access your thoughts with my markdown notes app project. Simplify your digital note-taking experience with seamless formatting, quick editing, and intuitive organization. Streamline your productivity and unleash your creativity with this powerful tool that brings your ideas to life.

projects.title: This Portfolio
projects.description: Introducing my portfolio website project, a captivating digital showcase of my skills, creativity, and passion. Not much to say here! This one just gave me a good excuse to spend a weekend practicing with skills and also get use Material UI a bit. Join me on this visual journey as I bring my ideas to life and leave a lasting impression. Stay tuned for future updates as I continue to expand my portfolio with more exciting projects.
